Verses: 1 eppiraayeem Manushar Egamaaik Koodi Vadakke Purappattuppoi, Yepthaavai Nokki: Nee Engalai Unnodekooda Varumpadi Azhaippiyaamal Ammon Puththirarmel Yuththampannapponadhenna? Un Veettaiyum Unnaiyumkooda Akkiniyaal Suttuppoduvom Endraargal.
2 adharku Yepthaa: Enakkum En Janaththirkum Ammon Puththirarode Periya Vazhakku Irukkumpodhu, Naan Ungalaik Kooppitten; Neengal Ennai Avargal Kaikku Neengalaakki Ratchikkavillai.

3 neengal Ennai Ratchikkavillai Endru Naan Kandapodhu, Naan En Jeevanai En Kaiyile Pidiththukkondu, Ammon Puththirarukku Virodhamaaip Ponen;karththar Avargalai En Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar; Ippadiyirukka, Neengal En Mel Yuththampanna, Indru Ennidaththirku Varavendiyadhu Enna Endru Sonnaan.

4 pinbu Yepthaa Keeleyaadh Manusharaiyellaam Kootti, Eppiraayeemarodu Yuththam Panninaan; Eppiraayeemukkum Manaasekkum Naduve Kudiyirukkira Keeleyaaththiyaraana Neengal Eppiraayeemaivittu Odipponavargal Endru Eppiraayeemar Sonnapadiyinaal, Keeleyaadh Manushar Avargalai Muriya Adiththaargal.

5 keeleyaaththiyar Eppiraayeemarukku Mundhi Yordhaanin Thuraigalaip Pidiththaargal; Appozhudhu Eppiraayeemarile Thappinavargalil Yaaraavadhu Vandhu: Naan Akkaraikkup Pogattum Endru Sollumpodhu, Keeleyaadh Manushar: Nee Eppiraayeemanaa Endru Avanaik Ketpaargal; Avan Alla Endraal,

6 nee Shipoledh Endru Sol Enbaargal; Appozhudhu Avan Appadi Uchcharikkak Koodaamal, Sipoledh Enbaan; Appozhudhu Avanaip Pidiththu, Yordhaan Thuraiyile Vettippoduvaargal; Akkaalaththile Eppiraayeemil Naarpaththeeraayiramper Vizhundhaargal.
7 yepthaa Isravelai Aaru Varusham Nyaayam Visaariththaan; Pinbu Keeleyaaththiyanaana Yepthaa Mariththu, Keeleyaaththilulla Oru Pattanaththil Adakkam Pannappattaan.
8 avanukkuppinbu Pedhlegem Ooraanaagiya Ipsaan Isravelai Nyaayam Visaariththaan.

9 avanukku Muppadhu Kumaararum Muppadhu Kumaaraththigalum Irundhaargal; Muppadhu Kumaaraththigalaiyum Puraththile Vivaagampannikkoduththu, Than Kumaararukku Muppadhu Pengalaip Puraththile Kondaan; Avan Isravelai Ezhu Varusham Nyaayam Visaariththaan.
11 avanukkuppinbu Sebuloniyanaagiya Elon Isravelai Nyaayam Visaariththaan; Avan Paththu Varusham Isravelai Nyaayam Visaariththaan.
12 pinbu Sebuloniyanaagiya Elon Mariththu, Sebulon Dhesamaana Aayalon Ooril Adakkampannappattaan.
13 avanukkuppinbu Illelin Kumaaranaagiya Praththoniyanaana Apthon Isravelai Nyaayam Visaariththaan.
14 avanukku Naarpadhu Kumaararum Muppadhu Perappillaigalum Irundhaargal; Avargal Ezhubadhu Kazhudhaigalin Mel Eruvaargal; Avan Isravelai Ettu Varusham Nyaayam Visaariththaan.
15 pinbu Praththoniyanaana Illelin Kumaaranaagiya Apthon Mariththu, Eppiraayeem Dhesaththil Amalekkiyar Malaiyilirukkira Praththonile Adakkam Pannappattaan.
